name: MEC Sleeping Bag Storage Bag - Unisex
categories: Sleeping bags, sleeping pads, quilts and pillows
description:
The best way to store a sleeping bag so it retains maximum loft, is to put it in a big sack.Made of lightweight ripstop nylon that lets your sleeping bag breathe.Wide drawcord opening.

        Sustainability
